alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Laurel (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurel and southern Jackson Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 135 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parrot, or 8 miles south of McKee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cornelius around 140 PM EDT. Dabolt, Annville, Bond, Green Hill and Shop Branch around 145 PM EDT. Olin, Settle Store, Atkinstown and Welchburg around 150 PM EDT. McKee, Mildred, Tyner, Gray Hawk, Egypt and Bradshaw around 155 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Herd, Privett, Zekes Point, Mummie, Maulden and Turkey Foot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
